parameters.name: DbName
parameters.description: The name of the DRDS database.

parameters.name: DrdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Message Queue for Apache Kafka instance.

parameters.name: GroupAttribute
parameters.description: The attribute of the IP address whitelist group.

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the IP address whitelist group.

parameters.name: IpWhiteList
parameters.description: The modified whitelist. Separate multiple IP addresses with commas (,).

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description:
Specifies the mode. Valid values:

*   `True`: append modifications
*   `False`: overwrite modification
